title: Basic Calculator
description: Create a basic calculator that can perform arithmetic operations on two numbers
acceptance: Must support addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division
Must handle division by zero gracefully
Must return appropriate error messages for invalid inputs
Must include comprehensive docstrings and type hints

title: Calculator CLI
description: Create a command-line interface for the calculator
acceptance: Must accept two numbers and an operation as arguments
Must display results in a user-friendly format
Must show help information when requested
Must handle invalid command-line arguments gracefully
